value:
$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Even though I just finished lunch in
the dining hall, it feels like I haven't
eaten all day. I'm already starving...$k$pI tried to find the kitchen, but none of
the staff were willing to tell me where
it was...$k$pIt turns out my older self had the
same idea when she was summoned
here in the past...$k$pI guess I'll have to take things into
my own hands... But where am I
going to find an easy meal?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Hey, Ilyana! Just the gal I was looking
for.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|You're...Mia, right? Why were you
looking for me? Are you bringing me
a snack?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Huh? No! There you go again, always
thinking with your stomach.$k$pLook, I was training in the forest
when somebody from a nearby
village called out for help.$k$pSome nasty bandits took off with the
local food supply, and they need help
getting it back.$k$pSo I'm looking for like-minded
warriors to help me do just that. Can
I count on you?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|They stole the village's food? Oh no,
that's so horrible...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|I know, right? I said I would help out,
but they laughed and said I was just,
well, just a kid.$k$pLittle do they know we're training
with members of the Order of
Heroes!$k$pThis is our chance to show everyone
what we're made of. What do you
think?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|It would be my pleasure...$k$pAll that food...enough to feed an
entire village... That would be wasted
on bandits.$k$pThose good people are counting on
every single grain. We have to get
it all back. They'll be so grateful...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Just to be clear, we're not doing this
for a rewa—oh, never mind.
Let's go!$k$pNow that you've got my back, I'm
more pumped than ever!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Mm-hm... Hold on, delicious food...
We're coming to save you!$k$p

$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|We did it! Good job, Ilyana. We
managed to recover all of the food
and capture the bandits to boot!$k$pAfter great teamwork like that,
nobody's gonna underestimate us
again. Right, Ilyana?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Let's see... Loaves of bread, bushels
of wheat... Racks of meat, barrels of
fish... Crates of vegetables and fruit...$k$pIt looks like it's all here. Wow... Now
that I see it all laid out, this really is a
lot of food...$k$pI've never seen this much in one
place before... It's...it's almost
overwhelming...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Er, right... I'm sure everyone in the
village worked their tails off to hunt
and harvest it all.$k$pThey wouldn't last through the winter
without it. We really saved their
bacon!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Huh? I don't see any pigs...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|It's a...never mind. Oh, I almost
forgot. The village is throwing a feast
in our honor tonight!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Really? That's... Oh, that's not good...$k$pThere must be another way...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Huh? I thought you'd be excited to
hear—wait, where are you going?$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|$Fi1500|Mia... I...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Come on, don't tell me you've
suddenly lost your appetite. Is that
even possible?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|The village needs that food for the
winter. It isn't right for us to eat it...$k$pEspecially me. If I started eating, I
wouldn't know when to stop...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Well, I can't argue with you there.
But I think it's very noble of you to
think like that. We don't have to go.$k$pBesides, saving the people of Askr is
its own reward, right?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Askr... Yes... I suppose the Order of
Heroes has a bunch of resources at
its disposal...$k$pNow that we've helped out, maybe
the dining hall staff will be a little
more friendly...$k$pThey'll have to keep the kitchen open
for us, now. We can eat our fill!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|So it's a feast after all, then! For once
I'm happy to hear you talk about
grub.$k$pWell, what are we waiting for? Let's
head back and chow down.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Right! I hope they're ready for us.
I'm starving. Heehee...$k$p
